title: Champion that Ages? Idea for RIot.
body: I have no concept made for this, but I think it would be cool if there was a champion (preferably a female because the other two time mages are guys) that ages as the game goes on. I was thinking some kind of passive that makes it so that the champion would start as a young kid with a set of abilities that slightly change as the game goes on and she ages. Like, imagine if she had a quick dash ability that gets slower as she ages, but more powerful and has some added effect, like a knockback. I think this would be awesome. Let me know what you dudes and ladies think in the comments below, or give this an upvote if you think it would be cool
